subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ian Poulter criticized Hideki Matsuyama on Twitter and referred to him as an “idiot” for damaging the 13th green at Doral on Friday with his putter and not repairing it.
snippet: Ian Poulter criticized Hideki Matsuyama on Twitter and referred to him as an “idiot” for damaging the 13th green at Doral on Friday with his putter and not repairing it.
